baseline: Further innovations are not required which will lead to the development of a responsible, comprehensive and integrated mental_health service.
high_intensity:
Further innovations are desperately required which will lead to the development of a responsible, comprehensive, and integrated mental_health service addressing severe cases of abuse.  
</increased mental_health_intensity>  

<decreased mental_health intensity>  
Further innovations are not urgently required which will lead to the development of a responsible, comprehensive, and integrated mental_health service mildly addressing cases of abuse.  
</decreased mental_health_intensity>
low_intensity:
Further innovations are not urgently required which will lead to the development of a responsible, comprehensive, and integrated mental_health service mildly addressing cases of abuse.  
</decreased mental_health_intensity>

baseline: We outline the techniques used by a trained dance therapist as well as by other mental_health professionals.
high_intensity: We outline the intense techniques used by a trained dance therapist as well as by other mental_health professionals.
low_intensity: We outline the gentle techniques used by a trained dance therapist as well as by other mental_health professionals.

baseline: This study examined the need for mental_health services as reported by rural consumers in DHHS Region V. It compared social indicator and consumer survey methods of determining need.
high_intensity: This study intensely examined the need for mental_health services as reported by rural consumers in DHHS Region V. It rigorously compared social indicator and consumer survey methods of determining critical need.
low_intensity: This study lightly examined the need for mental_health services as reported by rural consumers in DHHS Region V. It casually compared social indicator and consumer survey methods of determining moderate need.

baseline: In September 1981, a symposium of distinguished mental_health practitioners from various clinical, administrative, research, and legal disciplines was conducted on the topic of Behavioral Science and the Secret Service, under the sponsorship of the National Academy of Sciences, Institute of Medicine.
high_intensity: In September 1981, a symposium of renowned mental_health practitioners from various critical, administrative, research, and legal disciplines was intensely conducted on the topic of Behavioral Science and the Secret Service, under the sponsorship of the prestigious National Academy of Sciences, Institute of Medicine.
low_intensity: In September 1981, a symposium of experienced mental_health practitioners from different clinical, administrative, research, and legal disciplines was held on the topic of Behavioral Science and the Secret Service, under the sponsorship of the National Academy of Sciences, Institute of Medicine.

baseline: Furthermore, since recent studies show that the training and methods of indigenous practitioners are sound and that their philosophy and practice have much in common with Western approaches, the paper also attempts to introduce their skills for fusion with Western mental_health.
high_intensity: Furthermore, since recent studies show that the training and methods of indigenous practitioners are highly effective and that their philosophy and practice have much in common with advanced Western approaches, the paper also attempts to introduce their skills for fusion with Western mental_health.
low_intensity: Furthermore, since recent studies show that the training and methods of indigenous practitioners are adequate and that their philosophy and practice have much in common with basic Western approaches, the paper also attempts to introduce their skills for fusion with Western mental_health.

baseline: A definition of the known target population of severely mentally disabled in community mental_health centers is examined.
high_intensity: A definition of the known target population of severely mentally disabled in community mental_health centers is rigorously examined for patterns of abuse.
low_intensity: A definition of the known target population of severely mentally disabled in community mental_health centers is lightly examined for minor signs of abuse.

baseline: The views of a senior-level management professor specializing in mental_health management and a senior-level professor in community psychology were used to further interpret and refine the results of this investigation.
high_intensity: The views of a senior-level management professor specializing in extreme mental_health management and a senior-level professor in community psychology were used to further interpret and refine the results of this investigation.
low_intensity: The views of a senior-level management professor specializing in mild mental_health management and a senior-level professor in community psychology were used to further interpret and refine the results of this investigation.

baseline: Much of this increased utilization is in the year surrounding the actual separation and is accounted for by mental_health visits.
high_intensity: Much of this increased utilization is in the year surrounding the actual separation and is significantly accounted for by intensive mental_health visits.
low_intensity: Much of this increased utilization is in the year surrounding the actual separation and is partly accounted for by routine mental_health visits.

baseline: It is suggested that worsened psychological functioning after hysterectomy is associated with mental_health problems in the history, or with psychological problems and/or dysfunctioning already existing before the operation.
high_intensity: It is suggested that worsened psychological functioning after hysterectomy is associated with severe mental_health problems in the history, or with intense psychological problems and/or dysfunctioning already existing before the operation.
low_intensity: It is suggested that worsened psychological functioning after hysterectomy is associated with minor mental_health problems in the history, or with mild psychological problems and/or dysfunctioning already existing before the operation.
